docs.title: Dataset Extractor for LOTUS
docs.text:
LOTUS is a database with over 700'000 natural products (NPs).

For developing reasons it can be better to work with smaller datasets. This script can help to extract randomly or specifically a subset of this data.

The script allows you to choose from a taxonomy specific member a samplesize. You have to give your data to sample from and the location to save it. If the location to save it is the same as an existing, it will append it (and remove the duplicates). If the given samplesize is to big, it will choose the max. In the end, the duplicates will be removed.

docs.title: Information
docs.text:
Poetry was used as an environment control. It is highly recommended to use the *.lock file for set up the same environment.

# Install pipx and poetry
pip install pipx
pipx install poetry

# Install from the poetry.lock file (command should be run in the same folder as the poetry.lock file)
poetry install

docs.title: Running the script
docs.text:
The script main.py can be run from the terminal.

To run the script it is recommended to use it with the poetry command. 

# run the script in poetry and get the help page 
poetry run python dataset_extractor_lotus/main.py -h

Or a poetry shell can be used.

# run the script in poetry and get the help page 
poetry shell
python dataset_extractor_lotus/main.py -h

docs.title: Examples
docs.text:
One line command

poetry shell
python dataset_extractor_lotus/main.py -i data/test.csv -o test.csv -t organism_taxonomy_10varietas -m 'Abies sachalinensis var. gracilis' -s 100

interactive mode

poetry shell
python dataset_extractor_lotus/main.py

docs.title: to be improved
docs.text: ☐ In the moment, the samplespace will be sampled and then added to the existing dataframe. After this step the duplications will be removed. It would be better, if the samplespace would be first filtered out for the existing samples and then sampled. ☐ Add some default parameters for a faster toysample experience. ☐ possibility to add a seed, so the sampling step can be repeated. ☐ add parametermode for downloading ☐ check again, if the appending mode works well.

docs.title: LOTUS
docs.text: We combine natural products (NP) with organisms. Connect the points and grow.
